channel.title: CVE Feed for SharpZipLib -- SharpZipLib
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SharpZipLib -- SharpZipLib

item.title: CVE-2018-1002208|2024-08-05T12:47:57.500Z -- sharpziplib -- sharpziplib
item.description: SharpZipLib before 1.0 RC1 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
